name: .CVX File Extension
summary: Learn about .CVX files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a CVX file with various Canvas GFX applications, including Canvas X Draw, Canvas X Geo, and Canvas X Pro. For example, to open a CVX file with Canvas X Draw, select File â†’ Open....
Various Canvas GFX applications, including Canvas X Draw, Canvas X Geo, and Canvas X Pro, can convert CVX files to other formats.
For example, Canvas X Draw can convert CVX files to many file types including the following formats:
